rose

rose.ReducedBasisEmulator(interaction, ...)

A ReducedBasisEmulator (RBE) uses the specified interaction and theta_train to generate solutions to the Schrödinger equation at a specific energy (energy) and partial wave (l).

rose.Interaction(coordinate_space_potential, ...)

Template class.

rose.InteractionEIM(...[, is_complex, ...])

rose.utility.finite_difference_first_derivative(s_mesh)

Computes a finite difference matrix that (when applied) represents the first derivative.
